ygData.subject: Re: Bellow & just a comment in response to Bob Stewart's
ygData.msgSnippet: Nah, I m playing a woodelf as well.  It usually does 7pts for me.  Maybe it was tweaked since you first got it.  BTW, I love wood elves too much to play any
ygData.messageBody:
Nah, I'm playing a woodelf as well. It usually does 7pts for me. Maybe it
was tweaked since you first got it. BTW, I love wood elves too much to play
any other race unless forced to (my next chrt is an enchanter, and I don't
think wood elf is an option). I just love having forage & hide at lvl 1. :)

----- Original Message -----
From: John Kim <kim@...>
>
> And Bellow goes up a point in damage every other level or so.
> I'm curioius though why you're finding it does 7 points when
> you've just gotten it. If I recall correctly, it only did 5
> points max when I got it. Maybe wood elves have smaller
> lungs?
